name: mangata-e2e-tests
description: sets asset info for assets bridged from ethereum to mangata
author: Gleb Urvanov

scripts.postinstall: husky install ;  yarn config set enableTelemetry 0 ;
scripts.test-run: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --forceExit
scripts.test-parallel: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; node --expose-gc --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --ci --group=parallel --forceExit --workerIdleMemoryLimit=200MB --logHeapUsage
scripts.test-parallel-3rdPartyRewards: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; node --expose-gc --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --ci --group=3rdPartyRewards --forceExit
scripts.test-parallel-nativeRewards: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; node --expose-gc --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --ci --group=nativeRewards --forceExit
scripts.test-sequential-no-bootstrap: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --runInBand --group=sequential --group=-bootstrap --group=-rewards-bootstrap --group=-claiming-bootstrap --forceExit
scripts.test-seqgasless: export GASLESS=true; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --runInBand --group=seqgasless --forceExit
scripts.test-maintenance: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq-e2e; rm nonce.db; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --runInBand --group=maintenance
scripts.test-bootstrap: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --runInBand --group=bootstrap --forceExit

scripts.test-sequential: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --runInBand --group=sequential --forceExit

scripts.test-microapps-ui: rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --runInBand --ci --group=microappsUI
scripts.test-microapps-pr: rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --runInBand --ci --group=microappsUI --testNamePattern='^(?!.*Wallets\smanagement.*User\scan\sconnect\swallet\sTalisman).*$'

scripts.test-multiswap: export GASLESS=true; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --ci --group=multiswap --forceExit

scripts.test-xcm: export CHOPSTICK_ENABLED=true ; export MANGATA_ENDPOINT=wss://kusama-archive.mangata.online ; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --ci --group=xcm --forceExit --runInBand  #
scripts.test-xcm-moonriver: export CHOPSTICK_ENABLED=true ; export MANGATA_ENDPOINT=wss://kusama-archive.mangata.online ; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock;  node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --ci --group=moonriver --forceExit --runInBand -u #
